title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively. This behavior is unexpected and can cause visual discomfort.
OB: While resizing the window in the vertical direction only in the Control Example, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
EB: The tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should resize smoothly without any flashing during window resizing.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
